function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Carefully evaluate and acknowledge the limitations of the data collected during the lockdown period.","category":"Maintainance / decontamination of building water systems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Thoroughly review and clean the database to eliminate inconsistencies and ensure data quality.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use multiple methods of data verification and validation, consult with subject matter experts.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use multiple testing methods, consider a wider range of variables, consult with statistical experts.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regularly update and adapt software, explore other statistical software options.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use multiple statistical tools to cross-validate results.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene and safety protocols for data collection.","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilize advanced statistical models and techniques.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Installation of soundproofing materials and double-glazed windows.","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve ventilation and air quality through hvac system maintenance.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement social distancing measures, staggered scheduling, and use of barriers.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper ventilation systems, regular cleaning of household appliances, and awareness programs to promote energy-saving practices.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of water and energy-efficient appliances, implementation of water and energy conservation programs, and investment in sustainable energy sources.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote regular hand washing, disinfection of shared surfaces, and proper ventilation in facilities.","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limit the number of participants and maintain physical distance","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handle the materials with appropriate safety measures and sanitation protocols","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use data management software and automation tools for analysis","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct manual verification and validation of the word clouds to ensure accurate representation of data. use multiple data analysis tools for cross-validation.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement an automated tagging system to handle the large volume of tags efficiently. conduct regular audits to identify and address any overlooked or misclassified terms.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anonymize and securely store contextualized data. establish strict ethical guidelines for handling and analyzing contextualized data.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement a systematic categorization close proximity and improve airflow","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct thorough environmental risk assessments and implement measures to mitigate identified hazards","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide clear communication and context alongside the images to avoid misinterpretation.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Address inequality through social support programs and community initiatives.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Provide resources for hygiene and maintenance support, promote education on home hygiene.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement guidelines for fact-checking and verifying advice before sharing, and promote official health organizations’ recommendations.","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Include public health experts in joint analyses and ensure the consideration of health and safety implications.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emphasize the importance of continued adherence to safety measures, provide mental health support, and communicate the evolving nature of disease prevention strategies.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish strict hygiene and ventilation protocols, reducing the number of occupants per dwelling","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Providing support services for storage organization systems, regular cleaning routines","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limiting the number of visitors and
